item.description:
Whether you are a debutante, a French teacher, or your mother tongue is French, if you want to meet others who share your love of the French language, if you want to spend a very pleasant evening chatting in the language of love, or if you want to develop new friendships with French speakers, then you should not miss this Meetup.

This is a low key group. There is no stress on those who aren't yet proficient, yet there are enough fluent and native French speakers so as not to be boring for those who speak with ease. Those who are debutantes can speak if they want or if they feel they are not yet ready they can listen without feeling left out.

group.name: The Boston Metrowest French Language Meetup

item.name: MIDSUMMER MEETUP FOR LOVERS OF THE FRENCH LANGUAGE
